attributes.action: Prevent train drivers to strike or withdraw train services
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.standard.co.uk/news/transport/southern-rail-drivers-agree-deal-ending-18-months-of-misery-for-commuters-a3685526.html
Train strike: Southern Rail drivers agree deal to end 18 months of misery for commuters
attributes.background:
Strike action by Southern train drivers resulted in 18 months of chaos affecting millions of commuters. Now a deal has been accepted for a 28% pay rise.
This is an unacceptable outcome where the deal should be withdrawn, face public inquiry, and such strike action being made illegal in future
